enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve setting options related to the PseudoTCPBase instance, which can affect the state and behavior of the socket.
Both methods involve setting options, although setPTCPOption is more specific to PseudoTCPBase options.
The getPTCPOption method retrieves the option set by setPTCPOption, making it a direct counterpart for assertions.
Both methods retrieve options, although getPTCPOption is more specific to PseudoTCPBase options.
